Title: Relates to establishing an affirmative duty for individuals to assist injured persons in a motor vehicle collision
Summary: Establishes an affirmative duty for individuals to assist injured persons in a motor vehicle collision.
LawCode: Amd ยง600, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing an affirmative duty for individuals to assist injured persons in a motor vehicle collision
